Then Jonah<S>3124</S> prayed<S>6419</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> his God<S>430</S> out of the fish's<S>1710</S> belly<S>4578</S>,
And said<S>559</S>, I cried<S>7121</S> by reason of mine affliction<S>6869</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, and he heard<S>6030</S> me; out of the belly<S>990</S> of hell<S>7585</S> cried<S>7768</S> I, and thou heardest<S>8085</S> my voice<S>6963</S>. <sup>by: or, out of mine affliction</sup> <sup>hell: or, the grave</sup>
For thou hadst cast<S>7993</S> me into the deep<S>4688</S>, in the midst<S>3824</S> of the seas<S>3220</S>; and the floods<S>5104</S> compassed<S>5437</S> me about: all thy billows<S>4867</S> and thy waves<S>1530</S> passed over<S>5674</S> me. <sup>midst: Heb. heart</sup>
Then I said<S>559</S>, I am cast out<S>1644</S> of thy sight<S>5869</S>; yet I will look<S>5027</S> again<S>3254</S> toward thy holy<S>6944</S> temple<S>1964</S>.
The waters<S>4325</S> compassed me about<S>661</S>, even to the soul<S>5315</S>: the depth<S>8415</S> closed me round about<S>5437</S>, the weeds<S>5488</S> were wrapped about<S>2280</S> my head<S>7218</S>.
I went down<S>3381</S> to the bottoms<S>7095</S> of the mountains<S>2022</S>; the earth<S>776</S> with her bars<S>1280</S> was about me for ever<S>5769</S>: yet hast thou brought up<S>5927</S> my life<S>2416</S> from corruption<S>7845</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S> my God<S>430</S>. <sup>bottoms: Heb. cuttings off</sup> <sup>corruption: or, the pit</sup>
When my soul<S>5315</S> fainted<S>5848</S> within me I remembered<S>2142</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>: and my prayer<S>8605</S> came in<S>935</S> unto thee, into thine holy<S>6944</S> temple<S>1964</S>.
They that observe<S>8104</S> lying<S>7723</S> vanities<S>1892</S> forsake<S>5800</S> their own mercy<S>2617</S>.
But I will sacrifice<S>2076</S> unto thee with the voice<S>6963</S> of thanksgiving<S>8426</S>; I will pay<S>7999</S> that that I have vowed<S>5087</S>. Salvation<S>3444</S> is of the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>559</S> unto the fish<S>1709</S>, and it vomited out<S>6958</S> Jonah<S>3124</S> upon the dry<S>3004</S> land.
